name: SpaceRush
description:
Captains ahoy! You are in command of an interstellar ship on a long long way to it's home. You have powerful spacecraft with huge thrusters, but here's the catch: there are not so many fuel stations in the space! Luckily, there are some asteroids roaming, from which you could mine fuel.
Don't let your ship run out of fuel!
But that's not all: space is full of dangerous small comets: your ship won't last long if you won't protect it!

You have special drones at your disposal: they could help you with both those tasks

1. Tap twice on the comet to explode it and gain money
2. Tap on the green asteroid to send drone to it for fuel. Watch out: don't let your drone to drift away from your ship with the asteroid!
3. Tap on your ship to send drone to protect it from the comets
4. Tap on the drone to cancel it's current task and return to your ship
5. Buy additional drones, shield which protects the ship from the comets; heal your ship with the money

Keep in mind: don't let your ship run out of fuel and HP. Use your drones and fingers to get to your home!
May the fuel be with you
